item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0505; 10:09AM; 2081 N Redcliff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smEqsA; Silver Lake; KNOCKDOWN: Building type updated to a 2 story single family dwelling (with basement but not a hillside structure). 26 firefighters located (26 minutes) a small fire in the furnace room (and ductwork) in the basement. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E20 E211 E220 E56 RA20 RA56 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0505; 09:43AM; 2081 N Redcliff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smEqsA; Silver Lake; Two story hillside (reported as all level ground) with moderate smoke showing from the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E20 E211 E220 E56 RA20 RA56 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0975; 02:54PM; 3428 W 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GCseJi; Hyde Park; Firefighters have knocked down the bulk of the flames, which were well-developed in the attic space of the one-story home. The fire compromised the roof structure, leaving some hard-to-reach pockets of heat that will require an extended operation to remove debris and fully snuff out all hot spots. It took 41 firefighters 51 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E266 E294 E34 E57 E66 E94 EM13 RA34 RA66 RA894 RA94 SQ21 T66 T94; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0975; 02:03PM; 3428 W 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GCseJi; Hyde Park; PRELIM: Fire showing from a one-story, single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E266 E294 E34 E57 E66 E94 RA66 RA894 RA94 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1761; 11:15PM; 906 E 60th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GDmKy2; Florence; It took 61 firefighters 31 minutes to access, confine and extinguish the flames inside of a one- and two-story commercial building. No reported injuries. The cause is under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E14 E203 E21 E215 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E5 E57 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA21 RA814 RA833 SQ21 T15 T21 T3 T33 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1761; 10:44PM; 906 E 60th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/335ZSJT; Florence; PRELIM: One-story commercial with smoke showing. Crews have made entry to the building and are investigating the source of the smoke.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E266 E33 E46 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T21 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1230; 05:31PM; 10642 W Santa Monica Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/34mK1Hx; West Los Angeles; Fire in one unit of a two-story building (offices over parking) spread to the attic and affected at least three units with fire and smoke damage. Thankfully, the offices did not appear to be occupied at the time (upon arrival, firefighters searched and found no one). Firefighters began with a transitional attack, utilizing hose lines from the outside first then moving inside, as crews on the roof provided vertical ventilation allowing smoke and heated gases to escape. It took 30 firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause remains under investigation.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC18 BC9 CM42 E205 E237 E261 E37 E59 E69 E71 EM9 RA37 RA837 T37 T5 T61; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1230; 05:05PM; 10642 W Santa Monica Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/34mK1Hx; West Los Angeles; PRELIM: Two-story apartments with one unit well involved with fire.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC9 E237 E261 E37 E59 E71 RA37 RA837 T37 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1514; 08:06PM; 842 N La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uu7scs; #BeverlyGrove; 38 LAFD Firefighters, joined in initial fire attack by jurisdictionally adjacent LACoFD responding in Automatic Aid, took just 25 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one first floor pizza restaurant at a two story strip mall. One civilian is being medically evaluated at scene following smoke exposure. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 E97 RA61 RA861 T27 T61 + LACoFD Automatic Aid during initial fire attack; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1514; 07:41PM; 842 N La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uu7scs; #BeverlyGrove; PRELIM: Two story strip mall with smoke from two units on the first floor.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 E97 RA61 RA861 T27 T61 + LACoFD; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey
